scenario_text.value:
Heading out for a walk where anything could
be lurking around? I’ll pass!
I’ve got to agree with Ryo on this one.

But nothing’ll get better unless we take
action. Let’s at least find a safe place.

There’s no guarantee anywhere else will be
any better...

Okay, okay. I’ll check the classrooms.
You all should look somewhere else.

We have to come to a decision on this,
together. I want to hear from everyone.
Really? Let’s just think this through...
